title: Fatigue Countermeasures
content: Effective fatigue countermeasures include adequate sleep, strategic napping, caffeine timing, task rotation, environmental factors, and workload management. There is no substitute for sleep, but countermeasures can partially mitigate unavoidable fatigue.

scenario.story: An operation requires 16-hour coverage with two operators on a remote site. They've been splitting 8-hour shifts. A critical phase requires both present for 12 hours. By hour 10, both are making errorsâ€”slow responses, missed checks. They push through to completion.

options.A: Dedication and professionalism got the job done
options.B: The operation should have planned for fatigue management during the critical phase
options.C: Two operators should have been sufficient

scenario.explanation: Predictable high-demand periods need fatigue planning: pre-rest, scheduled breaks, task rotation, additional personnel. Pushing through degraded performance is accepting elevated risk. The errors in hours 10-12 could have been prevented.
